About Me

Let me tell you a few thinks..

BIO

I am a coder, developer, blogger, reader, gamer, music lover, I am mostly a self taught Full Stack Web Developer and Mobile Applications Developer. I have been dabbling in Computer Science for the past 10 years, often experimenting, learning new things, building personal projects and so on. My passion drives me to stay updated with the latest trends in the field of cyber, web and information technology. I have worked for Afghanistan Government for more then 9 years in deferent section of technology.
